name: tallinn-transport-raycast-extension
title: Tallinn Transport
description: Search for routes and times for buses and trams in Tallinn
author: jramirezs

commands.name: search-upcoming-times
commands.title: Search upcoming times
commands.description: Search upcoming times for buses and trams

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
